name: untitled hacking fps
description:
This game is intended to be more of an updated example of my ability as a programmer - not much time was put into the design process so don't expect anything great gameplay wise.

An untitled puzzle FPS where you hack drones, cameras, and robots.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls
  • ESC - Pause

Cameras

  • LMB  -  Click to hack an object
  • Q  -  Switch to last object hacked

Drones

  • WASD  -  fly
  • Space/CTRL  -  fly up/down
  • LMB  -  Mark a hackable object
  • Q  -  Switch to last camera

Robots

  • WASD  -  walk
  • LMB  -  shoot gun
  • E (hold)  -  Hack camera 
  • Q  -  Switch to last camera

If you get stuck, hit pause and restart the level!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
